ingredients: 1 lb lean (at least 80%) ground beef, cooked, drained
1 package (1 oz) Old El Paso™ taco seasoning mix
1/2 cup Old El Paso™ Thick 'n Chunky salsa
1 can (16.3 oz) Pillsbury™ Grands!™ Homestyle refrigerated buttermilk biscuits
1 cup shredded Cheddar-Monterey Jack cheese blend (4 oz)
Additional salsa, shredded lettuce, chopped tomatoes, sour cream and/or sliced ripe olives if desired
